snippet.title: Veil of Darkness (PC) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A complete playthrough of SSI's 1993 DOS PC horror action/RPG/adventure game, Veil of Darkness.

For a game that came on five floppy disks and only required a 640k 286 with a VGA card, this packs quite a punch! I got it for Christmas when I was 13 or 14 and played it endlessly. Looking back now and playing it again, I have no idea how I ever beat it. This game is HARD!

The combat is set to easy, because I never really liked the combat system and how hard the battles were at the higher levels. 

There is also a Japanese port released for the FM-Towns.
______
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
